title: Twitter : number of monthly active users 2010 to 2019
yAxis: Number of monthly active users in millions
summary: This bar chart has 37 columns on the x axis representing Quarter, and Number of monthly active users in millions in each Quarter on the y axis.
The Number of monthly active users in millions is highest at Quarter Q1 '18 and lowest at Quarter Q1 '10.
There is a difference of 306.0 between the maximum Quarter Q1 '18 and minimum Quarter Q1 '10.
